Player History
Signed as a free agent by St. Louis on 2/7/2014 to a 2-year deal worth $800,000 per year...
Injured on 8/24/2014 with a Sore Shoulder, out for one week...
Released by St. Louis on 3/31/2015...
Signed as a free agent by San Diego on 2/28/2016 to a minor league contract.
Injured on 5/31/2017 with a Concussion, out for one week...
Injured on 7/21/2017 with a Ruptured Medial Collateral Ligament, out for full season...
Had first career hit on 4/14/2019, off Walter Schutte (PIT)...
Hit first career homerun on 6/2/2019, off Andrew Chafin (ARI)...
1/31/2022: Gets a new one-year contract worth $550,000 through salary arbitration...
Was claimed off waivers by Houston on 5/13/2022.
Released by Houston on 10/3/2022...
Signed as a free agent by Philadelphia on 2/15/2023 to a 2-year deal worth $750,000 per year...
Released by Philadelphia on 8/14/2024...
Signed as a free agent by Kansas City on 2/3/2025 to a 1-year deal worth $1,000,000 per year...
10/29/2025: Signed a contract extension with Kansas City, $2,000,000 per year, for 2 years.
